commentBody:
We actually did have control of this nomination, because Scalia died a year ago and a Democrat was president.

You have your nerve when Republicans have literally stolen this nomination from us liberals. This has never happened in 240 years.

Now you are selling us out to the billionaires, you are fine with your leader who doesn't pay taxes but takes $1 billion in tax-payer subsidies, you have the ethically challenged plutocrat cabinet nominees, you are in bed with Putin, you have your leader who insults our allies, you are ignoring ethics, you have made your Faustian bargain.

Look in the mirror.
